a-na LUGAL EN-ia ARAD-ka {1}I-DINGIR lu-u DI-mu a-na LUGAL EN-ia UD 27-KAM₂ 01 me 20 {ANŠE}KUR.RA pa-ni-iu-te ša {1}{d}PA-rem₂-a-ni ina {URU}ur-zu-hi-na iq-ṭa-ra-bu-u-ni UD 28-KAM₂ ina ŠA₃-bi-ma šu₂-nu UD 29-KAM₂ u₂-na-mu-šu₂ al-lak ina {URU}sa-re-e u₂-še-bir-šu₂-nu UD 30-KAM₂ ina {URU}sa-re-e-ma ak-la-šu₂-nu a-di E₂ EGIR-MEŠ i-qar-bu-u-ni-ni i-se-niš {ANŠE}KUR.RA-ME ga-mu-zu lip-šu-hu bur-ba-a-ni
